<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.ButtonRefQualForUIParameter</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Dynamically set the Button Reference Qual of UI parameter dictionary entry to allow UI parameters to be linked to more button types</description> <name>ButtonRefQualForUIParameter</name> <script><![CDATA[var ButtonRefQualForUIParameter = Class.create(); ButtonRefQualForUIParameter.prototype = { getReferenceQual: function() { return "typeINwrite_back,chat_launcher"; },
type: 'ButtonRefQualForUIParameter' };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-09-04 17:47:07</sys_created_on> <sys_id>5fd0e273e76333005e3b03a003f6a9a9</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>ButtonRefQualForUIParameter</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Mobile plugin" source="com.glide.sg">0ced34cb6d2220100acb70b3534330d3</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5fd0e273e76333005e3b03a003f6a9a9</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-09-04 17:59:48</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>220</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
